meanings.definition: A person who advocates for a cause or idea.
meanings.sent1: The proponents of the new recycling program are excited to spread the word.
meanings.sent2: The proponents of renewable energy believe in a sustainable future.
meanings.sent3: The proponents of healthier school lunches are on a mission to banish junk food.
meanings.sent4: She stood out as a bright light among the proponents of change.
meanings.sent5: The passionate proponents of animal rights never give up on their mission.

meanings.definition: Those who support or promote something.
meanings.sent1: The proponents of the charity event worked tirelessly to raise funds.
meanings.sent2: The proponents of the new policy presented their ideas to the board.
meanings.sent3: The proponents of the local farmers' market always have fresh produce to offer.
meanings.sent4: In the business world, the proponents of innovation often lead the way to success.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated proponents of education strive to improve learning opportunities for all.
